hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest
